questions.question: This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates in a struggle against a corrupt government agency on an island known for its judicial powers. What is...?
This arc focuses on the backstory of Sanji and his connections to the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
This arc takes place on an archipelago near the Red Line and features the separation of the Straw Hat crew. What is...?
Rarely seen and highly respected, this form of Haki allows its user to exert their willpower over others, knocking out those with weaker wills. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This technique used by Luffy in Gear Fourth involves inflating his muscles and using Haki to maintain form. What is...?
This character, known for their Straw Hat, is the captain of the Straw Hat Pirates and dreams of becoming the Pirate King. Who is...?
Known for his 'Fire Fist' attack, this character is the sworn brother of the Straw Hat Pirates' captain and had the Flame-Flame Fruit. Who is...?
This former member of the Royal Shichibukai is known for their Snake-Snake Fruit powers and role as the queen of Amazon Lily. Who is...?
